articles.title: Anti-DPRK "Resolution" of UN Human Rights Council Rebuked
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK "Resolution" of UN Human Rights Council Rebuked 
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Monday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the adoption of an anti-DPRK "resolution" at the recent UN Human Rights Council session:
					 Another anti-DPRK "resolution" based on falsity and fabrication was adopted at the 16th Session of the UN Human Rights Council.
					
					 Such political swindle, conducted by the U.S. and its followers every year, only invites accusation and irony of the progressive mankind.
					
					 The DPRK decisively rejects the adoption of the "resolution", a product of their inveterate denial and hostile policy toward the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses, as the height of politicization and selection of human rights and double standards.
					
					 The world is now witnessing inhumane crimes of the "human rights judges" who mercilessly trample upon the sovereignty of an independent state and make indiscriminate raids on the base of its people's life under the signboard of "protection of human rights".
					
					 Those forces will surely face a stern punishment by history as they abuse the noble conception of human rights for their sinister political supremacy, not for global peace and wellbeing of mankind.
					
					 The more viciously the hostile forces slander the DPRK, the more its people will remain true to the Songun politics, the banner for defence of its sovereignty and prosperity, with the high pride of the ideology and system chosen by themselves.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to President of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of sympathy to Thein Sein, President of Myanmar, in connection with earthquake that hit his country, claiming casualties and material losses.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the people in the afflicted area and the bereaved families. He expressed the belief that the President and the government of Myanmar would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster and stabilize the living of the earthquake stricken people at an early date.

articles.title: Jia Qinglin on Sino-Korean Friendly Relations
articles.content:
Jia Qinglin on Sino-Korean Friendly Relations
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Sino-Korean friendship provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries is a common precious treasure that stood the test of the change in the international situation and has steadily grown stronger.
					 Jia Qinglin, chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, said this when meeting DPRK Ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong who paid a courtesy call on him on March 25.
					
					He noted that he would always remember the days he was received by General Secretary Kim Jong Il twice during his visit to the DPRK in May 2002.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited China twice last year. He met with General Secretary Hu Jintao and reached a consensus of view on important issues including the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations. As a result, there were great events and pleasant occasions in the bilateral relations.
					
					 The Sino-DPRK relations have preserved a good trend of development this year, too, he noted, adding that it is the consistent policy of the party and the government of China to steadily boost these relations. 
					
					 He expressed his stand to boost the exchange of high-level delegations and deepen the strategic understanding between the two countries and expand economic and trade relations.

articles.title: Foreign VIPs and Delegation Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign VIPs and Delegation Arrive 
						
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- L. Purevsuren, Foreign Policy Advisor to the President of Mongolia who is presidential envoy, and his party arrived here Monday.
					 The DPRK government hosted a reception for them on the day.
					
					 Also arriving here on the same day was a delegation of the Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia led by its Vice-Director Anatoli Kuznetsov.

articles.title: Participants in Meeting of Coal Industry Have Photo Session
articles.content:
Participants in Meeting of Coal Industry Have Photo Session
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The participants in the meeting of coal industry had a photo session at the plaza of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Monday. 
					 Leading officials of the party, state and army took part in the photo session together with them.

articles.title: Construction of Huichon Power Station Moves Ahead Rapidly
articles.content:
Construction of Huichon Power Station Moves Ahead Rapidly
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A remarkable progress has been made in the construction of the Huichon Power Station in the northern part of the DPRK.
					 The Huichon Dam project has already been completed with a road and parapets having appeared on the dam.
					
					 A prefabrication method was applied to the dam project for the first time in the construction of hydropower stations, some 10,000 cubic meters of concrete tamping being recorded a day to the maximum.
					
					 The spillway project and the Ryongrim Dam project are nearing completion.
					
					 A waterway tunnel was excavated in a short span of time and the power cable project between power stations No. 1 and 2 finished.
					
					 The generator structure of Huichon Power Station No. 1 is taking shape.

articles.title: National Basketball Tournament of Agricultural Workers Held
articles.content:
National Basketball Tournament of Agricultural Workers Held 
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The national basketball tournament of agricultural workers was held here. It was opened on March 24 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The tournament brought together 20 men and women's teams from across the country which won the provincial, city and county matches.
					
					 The men's team of the Soju Co-op Farm in Jongju City of North Phyongan Province and the women's team of the Posan Co-op Farm of Kangso District, Nampho City came first respectively.
					
					 A closing ceremony took place at the Indoor Stadium of Kim Chaek University of Technology on Monday.

articles.title: AFC "C" License Award Coaching Course Held
articles.content:
AFC "C" License Award Coaching Course Held
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- An AFC "C" license award coaching course took place in Pyongyang recently.
					 The course, held at the Sports Science Library and Sosan Football Stadium, divided into theoretical and practical workshops, dealt with training of juvenile footballers and the principles of football match.
					
					 Football coaches from various sports teams and teachers of juvenile sports schools participated in the course.

articles.title: DPRK Tops AFC U-19 Ranking
articles.content:
DPRK Tops AFC U-19 Ranking
						
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK tops the AFC U-19 football ranking.
					 The AFC posted the ranking on its website.
					
					 The ranking is based on the results of preliminaries and finals of the 2010 Asian U-19 Football Championship.

articles.title: New School Year Preparations
articles.content:
New School Year Preparations
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- New school year preparations are in progress in the DPRK.
					 Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 plans to introduce advanced teaching methods, while putting education on a modern and IT basis.
					
					 Secondary and primary schools in Pyongyang have updated their laboratories.
					
					 Pyongyang Jonsung Secondary School has fully prepared visual aids and experimental apparatuses 
					
					 Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University is building a new schoolhouse and planting trees around it.
					
					 Kanggye University of Technology held an exhibition of teaching aids to encourage teachers to learn advanced teaching methods and get a better understanding of multimedia-based education and tele-education.
					
					 The Kanggye City People's Committee and other organizations in Jagang Province have improved educational conditions of schools and sufficiently supplied school things to pupils and students.
					
					 In North Hamgyong Province in-service training centers have played an important part in improving teachers' qualifications and new multimedia have been supplied to schools.

articles.title: Historic Relics in Rason
articles.content:
Historic Relics in Rason 
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- There are historic relics of academic significance in Rason City, the DPRK.
					 Among them are primitive remains discovered on Cho Islet in Juche 38 (1949).
					
					 Stone tools and earthenware pieces unearthed on the island are preserved at the Chongjin History Museum.
					
					 Primitive remains, including drills made of bone and stone, discovered on Pipha Islet show that primitive men made fishing their life work.
					
					 A signal-fire post on Al Islet was used to signal pirates' invasion in the period of the Ri Dynasty. Some parts of the post remain now.
					
					 Josanjin Wall was built in March 1488.
					
					 There is a monument to victory in Josan village about 12 kilometers away from the Tuman River.
					
					 The monument conveys exploits of Ri Sun Sin, a famous patriotic general.
					
					 Uam Beacon and Kongju Wall are also well preserved in the city as historic relics.

articles.title: Quick Production Method of Soybean Malt Developed
articles.content:
Quick Production Method of Soybean Malt Developed 
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Research Institute of Nutritive Foodstuffs for Children has developed a new method of quickly making soybean malt, a traditional foodstuff of the Korean nation. 
					The institute invented a method of culturing hay bacillus, lactic bacterium and mold extracted from soybean balls made by the traditional method. 
					
					The institute also solved technical issues arising in its fermentation and quality change in a scientific way. 
					
					The new method takes only 20-30 days to make soybean malt with a good flavor.
					
					The new method is applicable to households, too.

articles.title: Halt to War Maneuvers Demanded by S. Korean Organizations
articles.content:
Halt to War Maneuvers Demanded by S. Korean Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic and public organizations including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally on Anmyon Island of Thaean County, South Chungchong Province, on March 23 demanding the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warlike forces stop at once the dangerous war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					 At the rally speakers charged that the coastal logistic support drill kicked off by the warlike forces is one for preemptive attack of aggressive nature.
					
					 They noted that the U.S. is talking about dialogue in public but it is instigating the south Korean authorities to kick up madcap war exercises for aggression in a desperate bid to ignite a war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 Pointing out that peace and reunification cannot be achieved through war but only through the implementation of the south-north joint declarations, they declared that they would stage a dynamic struggle against the war maneuvers.

articles.title: "Cheonan" Case Is Product of US-S. Korea Conspiracy--Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Cheonan" Case Is Product of US-S. Korea Conspiracy--Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The "Cheonan" warship sinking case was consequent on the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' scheme to bring the north-south relations to collapse and escalate the tension in the Korean Peninsula and then ignite a war against the DPRK.
					 The DPRK major newspaper Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The persistent "probe" into the case made by the south Korean authorities only shows that it was the most hideous conspiratorial farce, a slush farce orchestrated by themselves, the article says, adding:
					
					 It has been one year since the warship sinking case. In the period the south Korean authorities had to return to their senses and repent of their anti-reunification crime. But they use the case as a means for refusing the north-south dialogue, going against the trend of the times.
					
					 At the inter-Korean military working-level talks opened in February, they insisted on adopting "Responsible measures over the sinking of 'Cheonan' by an explosion and the shelling of Yonphyong Island and giving assurances against additional provocations" as agenda of the talks, despite the magnanimity repeatedly shown by the DPRK. In this way they brought to rupture the dialogue, focus of the attention by all Koreans and the world people. 
					
					 Though claiming that "the door is open to dialogue," the south Korean authorities are still raising "admission and apology" over the "Cheonan" case and the shelling incident as a pre-condition for dialogue in a desperate attempt to oppose its resumption.
					
					 The reality irrefutably shows why the south Korean authorities orchestrated the "Cheonan" case and how they bedeviled the north-south relations and escalated the tension in the Korean Peninsula with the case as a pretext.
					
					 The "Cheonan" case is just the worst provocation unprecedented in history as it pushed the inter-Korean relations to total bankruptcy and the situation of the Peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 With nothing can the south Korean authorities cover up the truth about the conspiratorial case and their treacherous crime whereby the north-south relations were brought to collapse and the Korean Peninsula fraught with danger of nuclear war.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Guiding Idea of Era
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Guiding Idea of Era
						
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea continues shedding its rays as the guiding idea of the times in the 21st century, too, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The last 20th century was a century of a great surge in the cause of independence against imperialism but the 21st century can be described as one in which this struggle is gaining in scope and strength.
					
					 The on-going struggle against imperialism is characterized by an indomitable struggle of the people not yielding to any threat and blackmail of the imperialists and their stubborn and persist struggle to put their independent will into practice to the last.
					
					 All the facts clearly prove the validity of the Juche idea that taught the truth that where there is oppression, there always comes resistance, the fixed truth that nothing can quell the desire of the popular masses for independence.
					
					 The issues of talents and human resources present themselves as very serious ones in the era of knowledge-based economy in the 21st century.
					
					 It is of particular importance at present to firmly maintain the Juche-oriented stand which calls for steadfastly planting one's feet on the soil of his or her own country and nation while boosting international exchange and cooperation. The road of independence indicated by the Juche idea is the most correct way for every nation to achieve its maximum free development and all-round efflorescence.
					
					 The reality in the new century proves that the Juche idea serves as one giving correct answers to the important issues related to the existence of humankind.
					
					 The disputes among nations and tribes assuming more fierce nature in the 21st century can be properly settled when they are based on the Juche idea and the Juche-oriented view on the nation.
					
					The Juche idea serves as a banner for soundly developing the relations between countries and nations which differ in ideology, religious faith, system and culture and a powerful weapon for frustrating the moves of the imperialists to drive a wedge between nations.
					
					 The Juche idea is a banner of prosperity as it helps the Korean people decorate the march of the 21st century with a great victory and exploits and make the country prosper and dynamically advance into the world and serves as life-giving water as it makes Korean-style socialism invariably shed its rays in the new century, too.
					
					 No matter what long way the Korean people have to go and no matter what happens in the international arena, the Korean revolution will never deviate from its chosen road, concludes the article.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the C.C., the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, issued a statement on March 20 on the occasion of the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said that Kim Il Sung was the founder of socialist Korea, adding that he founded and led the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East.
					
					 The feats performed by him in building a genuine socialist system centred on the popular masses are always shining in the history of the Korean nation, it said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, has steadfastly carried forward the idea and cause of the President.
					
					 He has made tireless efforts to realize the President's desire for building a thriving nation.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people, rallied around Kim Jong Il single-mindedly, will implement the behests of the President without fail.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Internet Website by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Internet Website by Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its Internet website the famous work of President Kim Il Sung "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" on March 21.
					 This work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively deals with the ways to achieve great national unity including the issues of founding a unified state through the unity of the whole nation, attaining the unity on the basis of love for the nation and the spirit of national independence, promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, putting a halt to all political disputes which stoke division and confrontation between fellow countrymen, realizing mutual trust and unity between the north and the south and refraining from rejecting those with different isms and joining hands with each other for national reunification.

articles.title: DPRK's Songun Politics Praised by British Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Songun Politics Praised by British Organization
						
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on March 23 posted on its Internet website an article titled "Songun politics-treasured sword for defending peace" with a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The article said that the ceaseless war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet belligerent forces against the DPRK are posing a great threat to peace and security not only in the Korean Peninsula but in Northeast Asia and, furthermore, in the rest of the world.
					
					 A war is prevented in the peninsula and peace and stability protected there thanks to the great Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, the article noted.
					
					 It recalled that the south Korean people are praising the Songun politics as a treasured sword of justice and peace.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked by Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked by Bangladeshi Organization
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee issued a bulletin on March 21 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 79th birthday of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 The bulletin carried an article titled "Invincible military power and Kim Jong Il" with his photo.
					
					 The article said that he has trained the KPA into a matchless elite army.
					
					 The DPRK led by him will demonstrate its might as the invincible military power which no formidable enemy dares attack, it added.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun, the birthday of President Kim Il Sung, was formed with due ceremony in Dhaka on Mar. 22.
					 The chairman of the C.C., the Workers’ Party of Bangladesh was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful events to praise the immortal feats performed by the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il before the Korean revolution and global independence on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Serious Radiation in Japan Spreads to Different Parts of World
articles.content:
Serious Radiation in Japan Spreads to Different Parts of World
						
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) --The leakage of radioactive substance due to the accident at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant in Japan is getting serious. 
					 The chief Cabinet secretary of Japan on March 26 told a press conference that radioactive materials 1 250 times the limit level were detected in seawater near the above-said power plant recently. This means the leakage has gone beyond the annual limit level. 
					
					 As regards this, experts are of the view that nuclear fuel contained in cooling water might have come through the pipes that connect reactors after being damaged inside nuclear reactors. 
					
					 The air and soil near the power plant were seriously contaminated with radioactive materials. As a result, the amount of radioactive substance 1.4 times the normal level of a year was detected in a single day in the area 30 km from the plant. 
					
					 The Austrian Meteorological authorities made public the observation results that the amount of cesium-137 leaked from the above-said power plant in 3-4 days after the accident at the power plant was equivalent to 20-50 percent of what leaked from the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in ten days after the accident there. 
					
					 The radioactive substance that leaked from Japan is steadily spreading to other countries and regions, raising a global issue.   
					
					 A small amount of radioactive substance is continuously detected in the air over the northeastern part of Heilongjiang Province of China and a very small amount of it has been detected in the area of Kangwon Province of south Korea since March 23. 
					
					 The Austrian Agency for Health and Food Safety on March 25 said that radioactive substance believed to have leaked from the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant was found in Vienna. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the National Police Agency of Japan announced that the death toll due to the killer quake and the ensuing tsunami increased to 10 489 and that of unaccounted for is 16 621 as of 10:00 Sunday. 
					
					 Aftershocks rock Japan continuously. 
					
					 Quake of magnitude 6.5 jolted the Tohoku area on Monday. Its epicenter was in the waters off Miyagi Prefecture. 
					
					 NHK said that there were 26 aftershocks of magnitude 1.5-6.5 from 17:52 of Sunday to 15:54 of Monday.

articles.title: Russian Lawmaker on Necessity to Bolster Strategic Nuclear Armed Forces
articles.content:
Russian Lawmaker on Necessity to Bolster Strategic Nuclear Armed Forces 
						
 Moscow, March 26 (KCNA) -- Victor Zabardin, chairman of the National Defense Committee of the Russian State Duma, at a meeting on March 24 underscored the need to bolster the strategic nuclear armed forces.
					 How to bolster the strategic nuclear armed forces is directly linked with the issue of the nation's military security and sovereignty, he noted, adding that it is the primary task for developing armed forces to bolster the strategic nuclear armed forces. 
					
					 The priority task for accelerating the modernization of the strategic nuclear armed forces in Russia is to have in place new means capable of overcoming the missile defence system, he stressed.

articles.title: Demonstration Staged in Russia against US Military Operation against Libya
articles.content:
Demonstration Staged in Russia against US Military Operation against Libya
 Moscow, March 26 (KCNA) -- A demonstration was staged in protest against the U.S. recent military operation against Libya in front of the U.S. consulate general in Vladivostok, Russia. It was sponsored by the Youth Guards belonging to the United Russia Party. 
					 The participants branded the military operation of the U.S. and NATO against Libya as an act of aggression and demanded they immediately halt it.

articles.title: Iran Snubs US Move to Extend Sanctions against It
articles.content:
Iran Snubs US Move to Extend Sanctions against It
 Teheran, March 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. move to extend the unilateral sanctions against Iran is a ploy to wage a psychological warfare against the Islamic Republic with the intention of protecting its power and authority, Foreign Minister of Iran Ali Akbar Salehi said in a recent radio interview. 
					 He condemned the U.S. for seeking to maintain its domination through sanctions.

articles.title: Giving Importance to Education in Revolutionary Tradition Called for in China
articles.content:
Giving Importance to Education in Revolutionary Tradition Called for in China
						
 Beijing, March 26 (KCNA) -- Liu Yandong, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and state councilor, underscored the need to intensify the education in the revolutionary tradition during her recent tour of different regions including Zuoquan County, Shanxi Province.
					 She stressed the need to let the people know well about the shining history of the party and conduct the education in the revolutionary tradition in an effort to promote the development of education, science and technology and culture in the revolutionary bases on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of the party. 
					
					 She underlined the need for the schools at all levels to include the education in the party history in teaching materials and lectures so that the youth and children may have firm faith and conviction of the leadership of the party and the socialist system.

articles.title: Intensified Ideological, Political Construction at Military Academies Called for
articles.content:
Intensified Ideological, Political Construction at Military Academies Called for
 Beijing, March 26 (KCNA) -- Guo Boxiong, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission, recently underscored the need to intensify the ideological and political building during his recent survey and study at Wuhan Area Military Academy. 
					 He underscored the need for the military academies to put priority to the ideological and political building and train new military talents with high qualifications so that they may act in concert with the party central committee and central military commission both ideologically and politically. 
					
					 He also called for promoting the scientific development of the military academy building with main emphasis on the national defence and army construction.

articles.title: Sites for Purifying Seawater Built in Different Countries
articles.content:
Sites for Purifying Seawater Built in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- 125 countries in the world built sites for purifying seawater and are operating them to solve the problem of water.
					 At present, these sites are capable of purifying 40 million tons of seawater a day. 80 percent of it is now used as drinking water.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il vuelve a presenciar la comedia ligera "Eco de la montana"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il vuelve a presenciar la comedia ligera "Eco de la montana"
						
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio en el Teatro Nacional de Drama construido nuevamente la comedia ligera "Eco de la montana".
					Los ejecutantes describieron vividamente con las habiles interpretaciones la imagen de la epoca de la decada de 1960 y demostraron sinceramente la altura espiritual del pueblo coreano en la epoca de Chollima que ha venido marchando a todo galope de siglo a siglo. 
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente felicito el exito de la funcion respondiendo a las efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					La comedia ligara "Eco de la montana", obra famosa de la epoca que cada vez que la ve hace guardar en el corazon la verdad de la vida, tiene la extraordinaria atraccion y capacidad de traccion que gana el corazon de la gente y le pone de manifiesto la fuerza espiritual, senalo y subrayo que con esto, la obra constituye hoy el intimo companero y manual de la vida del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Senalando que los funcionarios, los creadores y los artistas del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional estan cumpliendo magnificamente la tarea del partido de hacer sacudir todo el pais con el espiritu de "Eco de la montana", evaluo altamente los meritos de ellos y les dio agradecimiento.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para hacer que los creadores y los artistas creen mucho las obras famosas como dicha comedia y desplieguen con mas vigor las actividades de funcion.
					
					Acompanaron al Dirigente en verla los cuadros del partido y el ejercito: Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Mun Kyong Dok y Ju Kyu Chang, los jefes de departamento del CDN Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y los funcionarios de ramas de literatura y arte, prensa e informacion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe carta de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe carta de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio una carta que en representacion de los participantes en el XV simposio de los partidos politicos del mundo sobre la construccion de nueva sociedad, le dirigiera el dia 19 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinador del Comite de Coordinacion Nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico.
					La misiva senala que el Dirigente ha practicado la politica de Songun que deviene el gran modo de la politica de la epoca de la independencia y la invencible bandera de la Revolucion Coreana y puesto la patria de la nacion de Kim Il Sung en la posicion de la potencia ideo-politica, la militar dotada de disuasivo nuclear y la cientifico-tecnica.
					
					Destaca que el Dirigente frustro con el poderio del Songun el despotismo y las arbitrariedades de los imperialistas y la ofensiva de aplastamiento de los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus fuerzas seguidoras, defendio con firmeza el socialismo a estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares, con lo cual infundio la fe y el estimulo en la victoria a los partidos politicos y los pueblos progresistas del mundo que luchan por la construccion de nueva sociedad.
					
					Subraya que todos los participantes en el simposio rindieron unanimemente la mas calurosa felicitacion y el maximo homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien hace gran aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de la independencia del mundo y de las masas populares.
					
					Puntualiza que todos los participantes estan firmemente seguros de que tambien las nuevas decadas del siglo XXI continuaran brillando como las de gran victoria de la veterana y diestra politica del Dirigente.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia "resolucion" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia "resolucion" anti-RPDC 
						
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- Con respecto a que el Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU aprobo una "resolucion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 28 la siguiente respuesta a la ATCC:
					  En la 16a reunion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU se aprobo otra vez la "resolucion" anti-RPDC, penetrada de fraudes y falsedades. 
					
					Como reza el refran "el cuervo siempre canta con la misma voz", EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras escenifican cada ano esa farsa politica provocando la denuncia y burla de la humanidad progresista. 
					
					La aprobacion de la "resolucion" anti-RPDC, producto de veto cronico y politica hostil al regimen socialista coreano centrado en las masas populares, es el climax de la politizacion y selectividad del problema de DDHH y de la pauta de doble rasero en el trato de este tema.
					
					Por lo tanto, la condenamos y la rechazamos categoricamente. 
					
					  Ahora, el mundo esta viendo los crimenes de lesa humanidad cometidos por los "jueces de DDHH" que bajo el rotulo de "defensa de DDHH", pisotean despiadadamente el poder de un Estado soberano y bombardean indiscriminadamente la cuna de vida de su pueblo.
					
					  Las fuerzas, que aprovechan la noble concepcion de DDHH no para la paz del mundo y el bienestar de la humanidad, sino para establecer su malsano dominio politico, no podran evadir la severa sentencia de la historia. 
					
					Cada vez que las fuerzas hostiles difamen con maldad a la RPDC, el pueblo coreano apoyara mas hasta el final la politica de Songun, bandera de defensa de la soberania del pais y de la prosperidad sintiendose orgulloso de su ideologia y regimen optados.

articles.title: Se realiza en Pyongyang la reunion de industria carbonera
articles.content:
Se realiza en Pyongyang la reunion de industria carbonera
						
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion de los trabajadores de industria carbonifera.
					En la ocasion participaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los vicepremieres del Consejo de Ministros, los secretarios responsables de los comites provinciales del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC), los funcionarios directivos del partido, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, funcionarios de la rama de industria carbonifera, heroes, los hombres entrevistados con el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il e innovadores laborales.
					
					Antes del inicio de la reunion, los participantes escucharon la grabacion del discurso del Presidente pronunciado el primero de diciembre del 69 (1980) de la Era Juche durante la sesion ampliada del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC: "Para impulsar con vigor la revolucion tecnica en el sector de la industria carbonera".
					
					Al presentar el informe, el vicepremier Ro Tu Chol se refirio a las imborrables hazanas del Presidente y del Dirigente, quienes condujeron sabiamente la industria carbonera definiendola como la clave que impulsa con vigor el desarrollo de economia nacional independiente.
					
					Recordo que despues de la liberacion de la patria (15 de agosto de 1945), el Presidente dio inicio al desarrollo de la industria carbonera y realizo en toda su vida incontables visitas a las peligrosas minas carboneras.
					
					En 1994, ultimo ano de su vida, el organizo la reunion nacional de los funcionarios de la industria carbonera y se retrato con los participantes, apunto.
					
					Destaco que el Dirigente presento la industria carbonera como el sector priorizado de la economia nacional y conduce sabiamente para que se produjera un cambio decisivo en la produccion carbonifera.
					
					Subrayo que bajo la abnegada guia y el minucioso cuidado del Dirigente, se impulsaron la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de las minas, de modo que se consolidara mas la base material y tecnica de produccion carbonifera y se produjera gran cambio en el modo de trabajo y los rasgos ideologicos y espirituales de los funcionarios y obreros de la rama.
					
					Llamo a todos los funcionarios y obreros a que contribuyan activamente a acelerar la construccion de la gran potencia prospera al conquistar a toda costa la meta de produccion de carbon presentada por el PTC, poniendo de pleno manifiesto el indoblegable poderio espiritual bajo la consigna "!Corea cumple lo que decide!"
					
					Otros oradores juraron librar energicamente la lucha por modernizar y ampliar la capacidad productiva de las minas carboneras consolidando los exitos logrados en sus unidades para crear nuevos prodigios e innovaciones en la produccion.

articles.title: Caso del Cheonan es producto de complot de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Caso del Cheonan es producto de complot de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea 
						
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- El incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" es el producto de complot de Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas de llevar a la fase catastrofica las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, agravar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y provocar finalmente la guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido en su edicion de este lunes y prosigue: 
					
					Cada vez que las autoridades surcoreanas recurren a la "aclaracion" del incidente del "Cheonan", se revela mas claramente que ese caso es la pueril farsa orquestada por ellas mismas. 
					
					Hasta ahora, a un ano desde que ocurrio el incidente de "Cheonan", las autoridades surcoreanas nadan a contrapelo de la tendencia utilizandolo como pretexto para negar el dialogo Norte-Sur, en lugar de reflexionar de sus crimenes anti-reunificacion. 
					
					En las conversaciones militares de trabajo Norte-Sur realizadas en febrero pasado, insistieron, pese a la magnanimidad de la parte Norte, en fijar como agenda de la cita "tomar las medidas responsables por el hundimiento de la corbeta 'Cheonan' y por el canonazo en la isla Yonphyong y comprometerse a la prevencion de provocaciones adicionales", de modo que se llevara al fracaso el dialogo que centraba la atencion de toda la nacion y el mundo. 
					
					En estos tiempos, las autoridades surcoreanas dicen por una parte que "esta abierta la puerta del dialogo" y por la otra, niegan la reanudacion del dialogo presentado como su condicion "el reconocimiento y disculpa" de la RPDC sobre los incidentes referidos.
					
					La realidad muestra claramente como las autoridades surcoreanas llevaron a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas bajo el pretexto del caso de "Cheonan", inventado por si mismas, y como agravan la tension de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					El incidente del hundimiento del "Cheonan" es una provocacion nunca vista en la historia que llevo las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas a la ruptura total y a la crisis de guerra. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no pueden ocultar jamas la verdad del caso ni sus crimenes antinacionales de haber roto las relaciones intercoreanas y acarreado el nubarron de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Constructores de central de Huichon crean Milagros
articles.content:
Constructores de central de Huichon crean milagros
						
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- En el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon de Corea se logran sucesivamente los exitos asombrosos.
					  Termino la construccion del dique de Huichon y ya fueron formadas la carretera y la baranda sobre el.
					
					  En el periodo de esta obra, se creo el metodo tridimensional de construccion de dique por las piezas prefabricadas que fue el primero en la historia de las obras de central hidroelectrica y se realizo al maximo en un dia el apisonamiento de hormigon de mas de 10 mil metros cubicos.
					
					  Ahora se desarrollan en etapa final la obra del tramo de hidrometro en que se pondran las compuertas de gran tamano y la construccion del enorme dique de Ryongrim.
					
					  Ademas, en un corto plazo se completo el tunel para el paso del agua, se construyo el edificio de la Central Hidroelectrica No.1 de Huichon y se concluyo la extension de lineas de transmision electrica entre la central no.1 y la no.2.
					
					  Estos exitos sin precedentes son una manifestacion del espiritu indoblegable del pueblo coreano decidido a edificar una gran potencia prospera.
